content: Good implementation of a good game. But there should be an easier way to switch between asynch games. Bug: final score window lies on into next game
A good tactical game !
Good game overall but kicks you out too many times and hard to play any ranked games

very hard to understand certain areas of the game for example i have no idea what the bonus cards are for. i am familiar with the original game and it is very tough to play but a good game overall please fix issues
Just doesn't work
Good experience. Fun game. Well made
Interaction is lacking.
I love the original card game, but this just seems way too complicated, too many weird rules! I went through most of the tutorial and decided to uninstall and get a refund

Frustrating. controls are poor, and not very intuitive or precise, will often not register taps. recurring bug wherr counter offer does not work, and just accepts the AIs offer even thiugh i have counter offered. not impressed.
The games pretty good. the app is buggy. it works but a lot of things don't work. ie. deleting old matches, playing a second game without closing the app, and discarding cards

Still very buggy. Will not let me close/delete running games. Intermittently accepts gift card despite me making counter-offer. It's a very good adaptation of the board game, but it needs a lot of work to make it playable.

The actual game is great but the people who made this digital version is horrible. Takes 10 mins to make a move because the game doesn't register your move, unless you place the card at the exact spot and all the moons of the universe align perfectly. Seriously though, I can't tell you how many times I've tried to move my card to the crop area or to the trash bin, only for it to snap back into my hand.
I like it. It's a good adaptation of the card game. : )
Too many bugs. Frustrating to pay for a game and have it not work properly. Don't bother buying this game. Bugs!!

Wonderful game, but suddenly stopped working on my device (OnePlus 6). I've cleared data, reinstalled, rebooted, etc. It has issues signing in with Google Play, and then doesn't even let me begin a game, even offline games. Will update the review if/when it works again.
Lots of bugs
replyContent: Hi, can you be specific as to which bugs you are finding? You can send us an email to bugs@digidiced.com so we can try to find these bugs. Cheers

content:
Could not figure out how to discard cards. The tutorial did not explain it 
and we couldn't figure it out, so we could not even get through the 
tutorial.
replyContent:
Hello Zach,
to discard a single Bean card drag it towards you into the wooden trash box. I hope that helped.

content:
O. K at the beginning. One or two bugs. Latest update makes game playable 
again. Well done Digidiced for responding so quickly.
replyContent: Hi Paul, is everything working as you expect?

content: Do not work after newest update
Locks up too often. I am going to uninstall this app.
The original card game is fun but for me doesn't make a great mobile/tablet game. There are better board game conversions out there.

It takes a while to get used to the interface as it can be temperamental, particularly when discarding cards. The tutorial shows the basics, but it is only through repeated play that you make progress. It can be quite addictive even though the games can be quite long
Nice game, but too many bugs. But since I believe these developers - I know they will fix them sooner or later :)

I was never a fan of Uwe's predecessor to this, the multi-player tabletop card game, Bohnanza. Not a fan of THIS either, first time I tried it. But then I went over to YouTube and watched a couple of reviews and run-throughs, and turns out it's a pretty awesome two-player card game. And unlike some other Digidice titles, the AI in this one puts up a decent fight.
Tutorial bug is fixed and everything else works great. Awesome job.

Good game but needs some work. Need to be able to view beanometer for cards in gift phase (perhaps tap and hold a card in middle row?), have to hit 'proceed' button WAY too often for no reason, dragging to gift or discard way too picky about drop location.

Great game. There is a bug in the game. I have cards in my hand that are higher than cards in my field But the game won't let me put it there. The game forces me to harvest. Another bug is when I receive a gift sometimes I can't put it on the field even if the value is the same or the gift card is a higher value. I like this game. Please fix the bugs
Immediately encountered several bugs, a real shame---this is a great game!
Have yet to finish a game. The game freezes toward the end.
Game gets stuck on my Android turbo.  Same as the previous review... At the end when I'm about to win.  Good game other than that.
Game repeatedly gets stuck,  near the end,  usually when I'm winning.  Can pull up menu, but game won't proceed. Have screen shot if interested.
EDIT: Everything works great now. Awesome little game!    ORIGINAL REVIEW: nothing but a black screen upon startup. I'll revise my review if this is fixed and I can actually play it.
replyContent: Hi Tobey, are you using Oreo? We heard that the automatic permission does not pop up on these systems and that keeps people from playing. We are in the middle of upgrading our engine and will release an updated version in a few days. In the meantime please go to the settings of your device and give the permissions manually.

content: App crashes or hangs on resuming games, sometimes with missing graphics. Seems to be related to using notifications to resume game. I'm using an LG G5 with Android 7

NOTE TO THOSE GETTING A BLACK SCREEN: This is a bug with Android Oreo which causes the app to not prompt for the permissions that it needs. Go into your application settings, and manually add phone storage permissions to this app in order to resolve the black screen issue.  A great version of Bohnanza. I've never played the physical version of The Duel, and I did find the tutorial to be rather lacking, especially when it comes to explaining the bonus cards.
